patterns.comment: CSS style block, eg: style { color: green }
patterns.name: meta.embedded.css

patterns.comment: Less style block, eg: style.less { color: green }
patterns.name: meta.embedded.less

patterns.comment: SCSS style block, eg: style.scss { color: green }
patterns.name: meta.embedded.scss

patterns.comment: Top level blocks parsed as JavaScript
patterns.name: meta.embedded.ts

patterns.comment: Consume any whitespace after a comma

concise-attr-group.comment: Matches a group of non newline sensitive attributes in square brackets.

concise-html-block.comment: --- HTML block within concise mode content. ---
concise-html-block.name: meta.section.marko-html-block

concise-html-line.comment: -- HTML line within concise mode content. (content-html-mode w/o scriptlet)
concise-html-line.name: meta.section.marko-html-line

concise-open-tag-content.comment: Handles everything from the start of the tag name until the body content begins.

concise-semi-eol.comment: Match spaces followed by a semi that represents the end of the line in concise mode.

content-embedded-comment.comment: Match comment content, but allow Marko placeholders.

content-embedded-script.comment: Match script content, but allow Marko placeholders.
content-embedded-script.name: meta.embedded.ts

content-embedded-style.comment: Match css content, but allow Marko placeholders.
content-embedded-style.name: meta.embedded.css

content-embedded-style-less.comment: Match less content, but allow Marko placeholders.
content-embedded-style-less.name: meta.embedded.css.less

content-embedded-style-scss.comment: Match scss content, but allow Marko placeholders.
content-embedded-style-scss.name: meta.embedded.css.scss

html-args-or-method.comment: Matches parenthesis for arguments or continues into method shorthand if a { is found.

invalid.comment: Used to highlight characters in places where all valid characters should have been matched.
invalid.name: invalid.illegal.character-not-allowed-here.marko

javascript-expression.comment: Matches JavaScript source code, but always continues for certain types of expressions.

patterns.comment: We must match the some expressions ourselves since otherwise the js grammar can overstep.
We must match regexps since otherwise it can be cutoff by self closed tags or comments.

javascript-placeholder.comment: A JavaScript style template literal expression.

open-tag-content.comment: Matches everything within an open tag from tag name to the last attr.

patterns.comment: Attributes begin after the first space within the tag name

tag-before-attrs.comment: Everything in a tag before the attributes content

tag-html.comment: Matches an HTML tag and its contents

tag-type-args.comment: Type args after the tag name
tag-type-args.name: meta.embedded.ts

tag-type-params.comment: Type params before tag params or a default shorthand method
tag-type-params.name: meta.embedded.ts
